name: Wealthfolio
description: A local-first investment tracking app with portfolio tracking, analytics, and goal planning.
author: afadil

form_fields.label: Database Path
form_fields.hint: Optional. Path to the SQLite database file. If not provided, Wealthfolio will generate one automatically.

form_fields.label: Authentication Password Hash
form_fields.hint: Optional. If empty, a password hash will be generated automatically.

form_fields.label: Server Address
form_fields.hint: Address and port for the Wealthfolio server.

form_fields.label: CORS Allowed Origins
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated list of allowed CORS origins.

form_fields.label: Secret Key
form_fields.hint: 32-byte key for encryption and JWT signing.
